title.rendered: How to Search for Jobs on Handshake

content.rendered:
So, you’re ready to find a job or internship to kick-start your career. First things first, you should learn the basics of how to search for jobs! Our team has shared their top three tips for finding the roles you want using Handshake’s in-product features, including:

  1. Use search filters
  2. Utilize keywords
  3. Save jobs you like

Watch the video below to learn how to search for jobs on Handshake:

excerpt.rendered: Learn tips for finding the jobs you want using Handshake’s search features.
